item.title: Nano Bananaæ‰‹åŠæç¤ºè¯
item.description:
1

Use the nano-banana model to create a 1/7 scale commercialized figure of thecharacter in the illustration, in a realistic style and environment.Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic basewithout any text. On the computer screen, display the ZBrush modeling process of the figure.Next to the computer screen, place a BANDAl-style toy packaging box printedwith the original artwork.
